content: ***1 this pattern will release as a mal make-a-long so the pattern will be released in 5 parts over 8 weeks each part will be published in 2 weeks *** ***2 after a part is published you should update your ravelry library to get that part please make sure you have all 5 parts saved in your library by the end of the mal 3 this pattern is only available for purchase on ravelry *** **release dates** **shapla bil throw information - available now part 1 - 8 june 2023 part 2 - 22 june 2023 part 3 - 6 july 2023 final part 20 july 2023** this pattern is inspired from a flower called shapla shapla is the national flower of bangladesh in english it s called water lily i named this throw shapla bil which means water lily pond because this throw looks like a pond of lilies in my eyes this is my very first throw or blanket whatever you want to call it so this pattern will always have a special place in my heart i try to keep it as simple as possible i hope you will love to make this beautiful pattern **about pattern** **skill level ** intermediate **yardage** 3123 - 3254 yards 2856 - 2975 m approximately **crochet terms** us **pattern** written instructions and step by step images for every round **completed sizes** part 1 - 17 inches or 43 cm diameter part 2 - 27 5 inches or 70 cm diameter part 3 square -
